components.tooltip: Member of Armed Forces Context: A Member of Armed Forces are active Military Services members (during their exposure dates at Camp Lejeune). Civil Service Employee Context: Civil Service Employees are employed in the public sector by a government department or agency for public sector undertakings i.e., Government Employees. Civilian Military Dependent Context: This is more commonly known as “Military Dependent” Civilian Employee Working for Private Company on Base Context: Civilian Employee Working for Private Company on Base are workers who worked at a private company on base e.g., Burger King, Barber Shop, etc. Not Yet Born Context: Not Yet Born (In utero) meaning they were exposed during their mother’s pregnancy.
